main event: Sighting of a bright, rapidly moving object with a red and white spinning light over Middletown, New York in 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and approximately the size of a basketball.
The object changed direction abruptly at one point.
Several other witnesses, including some children, also observed the object.
The object appeared to expand and contract in size while hovering.
The object moved up and down in the sky and its speed increased as it continued.
sighted object: a bright, rapidly moving object with a red and white spinning light
